price: 186. Iedereen die Allah laat dwalen, kan niemand leiden; en Hij laat hen blind ronddwalen in hun overtredingen.
arabic: مَن يُضۡلِلِ ٱللَّهُ فَلَا هَادِيَ لَهُۥۚ وَيَذَرُهُمۡ فِي طُغۡيَٰنِهِمۡ يَعۡمَهُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: man yuḍ'lili al-lahu falā hādiya lahu wayadharuhum fī ṭugh'yānihim yaʿmahūna
